meanings.definition: A device used to connect balanced and unbalanced transmission lines.
meanings.sent1: The technician installed a balun to ensure the connection between the two types of cables.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to use a balun when connecting the balanced and unbalanced wires.
meanings.sent3: The balun walked into the party, bringing harmony to the different types of cables.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as a balun, bridging the gap between the conflicting parties.
meanings.sent5: The balun was like a mediator, bringing peace between the balanced and unbalanced lines.

meanings.definition: A type of transformer used in electronics to convert between balanced and unbalanced signals.
meanings.sent1: The electronic engineer designed a balun for the audio system to handle both types of signals.
meanings.sent2: When setting up the sound system, remember to include a balun for signal conversion.
meanings.sent3: The balun at the concert was the unsung hero, ensuring the music reached everyone clearly.
meanings.sent4: His invention was a balun for communication, translating the complex signals into understandable messages.
meanings.sent5: The balun functioned like a language translator, converting the signals seamlessly.
